title: Delhi: Customs department recovers foreign currency worth over Rs 10 crore at IGI airport
description: Delhi: Customs department recovers foreign currency worth over Rs 10 crore at IGI airport Delhi news: "On the basis of profiling, the officers of Airport Customs, IGI Airport, Terminal-3, New Delhi have booked the biggest-ever case of smuggling of foreign currency through any airport in India on 21 ...
